title: Stepfather also charged in fatal shooting of toddler
content:
CLARKSVILLE, TN (WSMV) -
A second arrest has been made in connection to the shooting death of a toddler in Clarksville.
David Wi has been charged with conspiracy to commit criminal homicide.
Wi, a soldier stationed at Fort Campbell, is the stepfather of 2-year-old Joseph Bankston, who was shot to death earlier this month.
Investigators said Wi conspired with Zackery Alexander in the toddler’s murder and the shooting of Brandon Jimenez. Alexander, also a Fort Campbell soldier, was arrested earlier this week and charged with criminal homicide.
Witnesses said the gunman went into the home and opened fire, intentionally killed Joseph.
Jimenez is the boyfriend of Joseph’s mother. He was still in critical condition Friday night at Vanderbilt University Medical Center.
Wi’s bond has been set at $5 million.
Police said this investigation is ongoing. Anyone with additional information is asked to contact Det. Tim Anderson at 931-648-0656, ext. 5132, or Crime Stoppers at 931-645-8447.
